translations: n.拨号；[矿业]罗盘导线测量
v.拨号（dial 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 罗盘导线测量, 拨号设置
固定号码拨号, 限制呼叫, 固定拨号
国际直接拨号, 国际直拨, 国际长途直拨电话
缩位拨号, 简缩拨号, 简易拨号, 详细翻译
语音拨叫, 语音拨号

sentences.sentence: It was only as she tried for the second time that she realized that there was no dialling tone.
sentences.translation: 当她第二次拨号时，才意识到没有拨号音。

sentences.sentence: All our rooms have direct dialling telephones.
sentences.translation: 我们所有的房间都有直拨电话。

sentences.sentence: Simon finished dialling and clamped the phone to his ear.
sentences.translation: 西蒙拨完号码，把话筒紧夹在耳朵上。
